Level Thirteen.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Thirteen.
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, July 18, 2001 - 04:11 am:

Stage 13


From where you start,move right one step. And wait for the "wrapped-up ghost" to fly past you. While is fly past you,jump rightwards onto the ledge,and run towards to the right until you see a bell which will summmon the suzurin. Wait for the wrapped-up ghost to come near you,and wait for it to go away again,than take the bell which will release the suzurin. If you are fast an skillful enough,you may go back to the ledge,and smash the box on-yop of you,and take an item which you let you carry more fireworks. Destroy the box below you,and with correct timing,jump down,and get the golden key. With correct timing,not to jump down when the ducken is going to shoot it's missles. Jump and hide for the mean time,at that place which have a mystery disc piece. Wait for the ducken to shoot finish it's next missle,than dash into the other place,and take the golden coin. Jump up and stand on the ledge,while facing right,than create a box at the same level as the jell,and once the jell steps on it,destroy it,and the jell will fall to it's death. And make sure,you have one box to block the ducken's attack,and please remember that. And go up to the ledge which the jell which was once alive. Now,create right/underneath box for yourself to stand on. And once stand on it,you create another right/underneath box,so that if the ducken destroy it,everything's fine. And create another box,and wait for the jell to stand on it,and than destroy it. And becareful,if the ducken has alreayd destroy your box. Create boxes again,and dash up,AND YOU WIN STAGE 13.
